# Fortify Cold Creatures (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 94

Creatures with the cold subtype gain a +1 sacred bonus on all attack rolls and on saving throws against fire effects.
